title: [AUTOFIX][ISSUE-2263][CANDIDATE-2] Fix from_dict falsy value handling (0, False)
summary: Fix bug in Todo.from_dict where falsy values (0, False) were incorrectly converted to empty strings due to the `or` operator pattern. Changed to use `None` as sentinel for missing fields, allowing proper preservation of falsy values while maintaining auto-timestamp behavior.
risks: Changed behavior: Empty string ('') timestamp values will now be preserved instead of triggering auto-timestamp fill (edge case, unlikely to affect real usage)
acceptance_criteria_met: Missing created_at field auto-fills with timestamp (preserves __post_init__ behavior)
implementation_notes: Used None as sentinel value instead of empty string to distinguish 'missing field' from 'explicitly set to empty/zero/false'. Updated __post_init__ to check `is None` instead of truthiness check.
